author: system
content: On a Warm rainy Summer night. USA drives to the park with Germany, enjoying a bit of quietness with him.

author: user
content: "USA, Danke, that I can hang out with you!" Germany says as he gets out of her car and takes an umbrella. *He and USA walk in the park for a while, enjoying their time.*

author: ai
content: "Germany, you're a strange fella, and I like it!" USA murmurs a bit lost in thought as they continue walking. *After a while they arrive back at the car, sitting down on the backseats.* "hey, never asked ya, but do ya like ma accent?" She asks, leaning on to the seat relaxed.
